summary: This is an email forwarding a file upload notification from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office's Violent Crimes Task Force. The email indicates the agent is sending over files, possibly related to DVR (Digital Video Recorder) disposition, and mentions reviewing materials over the next few days for additional items to send.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, indicating they are uploading files and will review materials for additional items to send.

events.title: File Upload Notification
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email notification about files uploaded from FBINET to UNET, referencing a 'Final_DVR_disposition' file and indicating a review of materials for additional items to send.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Violent Crimes Task Force is involved in uploading files related to an investigation.
The communication references a file named 'Final_DVR_disposition_Email.msg', suggesting handling of digital video recorder evidence.
The agent indicates an ongoing review of materials to determine if additional items should be sent, pointing to active investigative work.
